title: Memory Test
description: A simple memory test game built inspired by the Human Benchmark. Can you remember which words you've seen before and which you haven't?

title: To Do List
description: A simple to do list app. Includes features like adding, deleting, and marking tasks as completed, as well as local storage functionality.

title: Odin Calculator
description: A simple calculator app made for the Odin Project. Includes features like adding, subtracting, multiplying, and dividing.
